name: Roberto Segarra
label: Senior Data Analyst
summary: Aspiring data scientist passionate about using data to drive positive changes in my community. Curious, analytical, and always learningâ€”whether it's exploring new datasets, baking bread, or going on adventures with my wife Kati and our beagle, Fig.

work_experience.summary: Automating reporting processes, integrating complex data systems, and building insightful dashboards to support underwriting and operational efficiency. Proficient in Python, SQL, Tableau, and VBA, with a proven track record of reducing manual workloads, enhancing data accuracy, and driving data-informed decision-making across cross-functional teams.
highlights: Tasked with overseeing intergration of auditing datascources into a seamless reporting dashboard
Created an automated random selection of audits; impacting Sales agent compensation
Created various automations using python to eliminate work-flow inefficiencies

work_experience.summary: Provides support for the Underwriting department, data requests, and automation
highlights: Created over 300 custom letters for the in-house letter generation program, ensuring consistency across business units.
Tasked with extracting data from multiple sources and systems to generate actionable insights.

degrees: Master of Business Administration: Business Analystics
